Joey isn't so much talking about things

religion politicians Trump Obama
self-improvement black on black crime
it's a lot it's a lot to digest
Joey goes into so many topics he doesn't
necessarily come out of this album
having solved any of them and not that I

a service by highlighting these issues
venting on them in a very cathartic way

they're not just statistics it's not

holding he's tired of just this endless
cycle of pain and suffering and equality
